content.rendered:
We are a very busy family-owned specialized wholesale and retail meat processing facility focused on poultry processing.

We currently have urgent job openings for skilled and experienced Retail and Wholesale Production Butchers and we have 8 positions available.

We are seeking butchers with a minimum of three to five years of current or previously acquired and verifiable hands-on experience.

The ideal candidate must be well versed in the following job-related tasks:

Knife handling, skilled in cutting and sectioning of meat carcasses, deboning meat and speciality cuts processing and sectioning of meat.

The ideal candidate will also possess good interpersonal skills and be able to work under pressure.

The salary offered is $ 19.00 / hr for 40 hrs a week.

The employment position is offered on a permanent full-time basis.

The adequate candidate will demonstrate independent butcher skills.

Secondary school required.
